content.webTitle: Wenger to explain 'cheating' comments to FA

fields.headline: Wenger to explain 'cheating' comments to FA
fields.bodyText: The FA have announced that Arsene Wenger might have to join his Arsenal players in the dock after accusing Ruud van Nistelrooy of "cheating" during the game at Old Trafford on Sunday. The Arsenal boss will not automatically be charged with misconduct, but he must at least provide a written explanation to the FA as to why he was so scathingly critical of the United striker. The FA said on their website, www.theFA.com: "The FA has written to Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger seeking his explanantions for comments regarding Ruud van Nistelrooy made after the match with Manchester United at Old Trafford on Sunday, September 21."
